customErrorMessages.errorMessage: This sequence Number is Greater than Total size of Designers or less than 0.
Duplicate Sequence Number. As this Sequence Number already exists on one of the Designer.
This Author already exists. Please choose other author.
This sequence Number is Greater than Total size of Authors or less than 0.
Duplicate Sequence Number. As this Sequence Number already exists on one of the Author.
This designer already exists. Please choose other designer.
This inventor already exists. Please choose other inventor.
This sequence Number is Greater than Total size of Inventors or less than 0.
Sequence No 1 can only assigned to primary author.
Sequence No 1 can only assigned to primary designer.
Sequence No 1 can only assigned to primary inventor.
Duplicate Sequence Number. As this Sequence Number already exists on one of the Inventors.

rules.name: Greater_than_size_Error
rules.conditionLogic: ( ( 1 AND 5 AND 2 ) OR ( 6 AND 3 ) OR 4 ) AND 7
rules.label: Greater than size Error
